"Details": "Death Anniversary of Hazrath Shaikh Sharafuddeen Bu Ali Qalandar Panipati also known as Bu-Ali Qalandar (رضي الله عنه). A Sufi saint of the Chishtī Order who lived and taught in India. His dargah (mausoleum) is in the town of Panipat"

column2: Sayyidah Khadījah al-Kubra (Khadijah the Great) (رضي الله عنه)
column3: wife of Rasulullah (صلى الله عليه وسلم). Her place of resting is in Jannat al-Mu'alla in Mecca

column2: Sayyidah ‘Ā’ishah bint Abī Bakr (رضي الله عنه)
column3: wife of Rasulullah (صلى الله عليه وسلم). Her place of resting is in Jannat al-Baqi in Medina

column1: "Details": "Death Anniversary of Hazrath Nasiruddin Mahmud Chirag-Dehlavi (رضي الله عنه) also known as Roshan Chirag-e-Delhi ( known as the Illuminated Lamp of Delhi). His dargah (mausoleum) is in the town of Delhi

column2: when Muslims took control of the city after being away from it for 8 years"
